mapper.select: select attr.attr_id as attrId,attr.attr_name as attrName,attr.attr_parent as attrParent,attr.attr_value as attrValue, attr.attr_num as attrNum,attr.attr_type as attrType,attr.approval_id as approvalId from approval_attr attr join approval app on app.approval_id = attr.approval_id where app.org_id = #{ orgId }
